text: Except as provided in § 34-2202.17(b), Chapter 3A of Title 2 shall not apply to the Authority.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 43-1684.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-171 substituted "Chapter 3A of Title 2" for "§ 2-301.01 et seq.".

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2201.01.

For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 34-808.02.

DC CODE § 34-2202.14

Current through December 11, 2012
